description: System-generated unique identifier for this reference mapping between reporting objects; serves as the primary key for the table.
Name or identifier of the source reporting object that owns the link to a related object; likely the parent report or dataset (confirm with SME).
Field within the source object whose value is used as the linking key to the related target object; likely a primary or foreign key (confirm with SME).
Name or identifier of the target reporting object reached via the link or drill-through from the source object.
Field in the target object that holds the corresponding value used to match and join with the source field.
User-facing label presented for this relationship or link in the interface or reports; controls what users see as the clickable name.
